/start: Welcome, <%=username%>! I'm a unofficial and open source utility bot for BogTools and the BOG token. Check what I can do for you with /help
/help: - /price - Returns the price of BOG - /setAddress address - Sets the default address for the other commands - /earnings [address] - Returns the ammount of staked earnings - /resume - Returns a resume of the accound and of the BOG token - /bogToUsd ammount - Converts ammount of BOG to USD - /usdToBog ammount - Converts ammount of USD to BOG - /subscribe eventName [address] - Subscribe to a sniper event - /unsubscribe eventName [address] - Subscribe from a sniper event - /subscriptions - Check your current subscriptions and possible events - /source - My source code!
/setAddress-no-address: To set your default address you need to specify a address. For example: /setAddress 0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099
not-registered: Your user is not registered, please run /start to register
/earnings-no-address: Please provide a address like this: /earnings 0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099 You can also set a default addres with /setAddress and then simply call /earnings.
/bogToUsd-no-amount: You need to provide the ammount of BOG that you want to convert to USD. For example: /bogToUsd 5
/resume: Resume for <%=address%>: - Current BOG price: $<%=bogPrice%> - Staked earnings: <%=stakedEarningsBog%> BOG = $<%=stakedEarningsUsd%> - Current balance: <%=balanceBog%> BOG = $<%=balanceUsd%>
/usdToBog-no-amount: You need to provide the ammount of USD that you want to convert to BOG. For example: /usdToBog 5
/balance-no-address: Please provide a address like this: /balance 0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099 You can also set a default addres with /setAddress and then simply call /balance
/subscribe-no-args: Please provide a event name and address like this: /subscribe eventName 0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099 You can also set a default addres with /setAddress and then simply call /subscribe eventName Possible events: <%= possibleEvents.join(', ') %> You can also use "all" as event name and/or address.
/subscribe-already-subscribed: You are already subscribed to that event/address!
/subscribe: You have been succesfully subscribed to <%=eventName%> events on <%=address%><% if (address === 'all') { %> addresses<% } %>!
/subscriptions-no-subscriptions:
You have no subscriptions!
Try subscribing to a event using /subscribe
/subscriptions: Your current subscriptions: <% for (const subscription of subscriptions) { %>- <%= subscription.eventName %> events on <%= subscription.address %><% if (subscription.address === 'all') { %> addresses<% } %><% } %> Possible events: <%= possibleEvents.join(', ') %>
/source: You can find my source code on https://github.com/imharvol/bog-utils-bot!
/unsubscribe-no-args: Please provide a event name and address like this: /unsubscribe eventName 0xd7b729ef857aa773f47d37088a1181bb3fbf0099 You can also set a default addres with /setAddress and then simply call /unsubscribe eventName You can also use "all" as event name and/or address
/unsubscribe-not-subscribed: You are not subscribed to that event/address
/unsubscribe: You have been succesfully unsubscribed from <%= eventName %> events on <%= address %><%if (address === 'all') { %> addresses<% } %>
snipe-event-triggered: Event <%= eventName %> has been triggered for order id <%= orderID %> and owner <%= address %>
